statements: SELECT * FROM customer_ltv;
SELECT total_revenue, total_orders FROM customer_ltv WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, avg_order_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE avg_order_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_revenue BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT customer_id, total_orders FROM customer_ltv ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_revenue, total_orders, avg_order_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, total_revenue, total_orders, avg_order_value FROM customer_ltv ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_revenue, total_orders, avg_order_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_revenue > 1000 AND avg_order_value < 50;
SELECT customer_id, total_revenue, total_orders, avg_order_value FROM customer_ltv ORDER BY total_orders ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_revenue, total_orders, avg_order_value FROM customer_ltv WHERE total_revenue BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_spent ASC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, customer_name;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5 AND price < 50;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_amount
FROM customers
JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
WHERE total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity, price
FROM customers
JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
JOIN purchases ON orders.order_id = purchases.order_id
WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND quantity >= 5;

SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount
FROM customers
JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
ORDER BY order_date ASC, total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_price FROM customers, transactions JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, t.quantity, t.total_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(t.quantity) AS total_quantity_sold, SUM(t.total_price) AS total_sales FROM transactions t JOIN products p ON t.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name;

SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS total_orders, SUM(t.total_price) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id GROUP BY c.customer_name HAVING COUNT(o.order_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, ltv FROM ltv_metrics WHERE ltv > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(total_price) AS total_revenue, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM transactions GROUP BY order_id HAVING total_revenue > 1000;
